title: Rads Error
body: Guys can u help me with this problem, that rads error with the http, i cant solve it, i tried all the things on the internet and none of the worked.

replies.body: Unfortunately, I'm not fully understanding your issue.  At what point are you receiving an error, and what does it say exactly?  Some more details will help me determine what's going on.  Anything can help!

When i try to open league of legends it says this ``Could not connect to HTTP server.Please check that your internet is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking acces.`` my internet works good and i tried turning the firewall off and nothing happened, that thing with adapter settings and that port 8888 or 8844 its not working either, i tried everything on the internet.

Try our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)!  There will be options available within to automatically configure your firewall settings.  Let me know if that helps!
